snippet: The Rams earned their program-record 12th victory by beating Sacred Heart, 37-27, in a Football Championship Subdivision playoff game.
abstract: Fordham beats Sacred Heart, 37-27, in a Football Championship Subdivision playoff game.
lead_paragraph: The Rams earned their program-record 12th victory by beating Sacred Heart, 37-27, in a Football Championship Subdivision playoff game.

headline.main: For Fordham, a Special Season Lives On
headline.print_headline: For Fordham, a Special Season Lives On
